name: xwiki
tagline: An enterprise grade wiki and knowledge platform
description: XWiki is a powerful self-hosted enterprise wiki and knowledge management platform. It supports structured data, scripting, extensions, and fine-grained permissions, and can be deployed on-premises or via hosted services.

features.title: Structured Content
features.description: Create pages with custom data structures using classes and properties for database-like organization

features.title: Advanced Permissions
features.description: Control access at page, space, and element levels with user groups and fine-grained rules

features.title: Extension Ecosystem
features.description: Install applications and macros from the extension repository to add functionality without coding

features.title: Scripting Support
features.description: Embed Velocity, Groovy, and JavaScript code in pages for dynamic content and automation

features.title: Version Control
features.description: Track all page changes with full revision history, diff viewing, and rollback capabilities

features.title: Multi
features.description: Host multiple independent wikis on a single installation with shared or separate user bases

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Edit pages with a visual editor or switch to wiki markup for advanced formatting control

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find content quickly with full-text search across pages, attachments, and metadata
